Commercial users of our services are urged to contact us to establish an agreement of use. Parameter.Name: B in HDZ Components
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_and_epoch
Parameter.Description: Magnetic field B in HDZ vector components

Parameter.Name: thg_mag_and_epoch
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function COMP_THEMIS_EPOCH with the following input parameters: thg_mag_and_epoch0, thg_mag_and_time.
